divs: Sighting DetailsThis wont be a narrative, just answers to the questions above.1.I was drivingsouth down I-75 after North Baltimore and before Van Buren.2.I just happened toglance out the window and there it was. I had never noticed it before, so itcaught my attention.3.I thaught it was an antanae tower of some kind, but thesky was lit rather well by the full moon and I could see no poles or structureof any kind.4.I got off at the next exit, turned and went back north and theobject was gone.5.It was stationary, then it dissappeared.6.It just wasnt thereany more.
Summary: Saw three red lights in a triangular pattern
trends: There have been no other sightings in Van Buren,North Baltimore
This sighting has never been favorited.
